attributes.action: All volunteer interns to receive reasonable travel and subsistence expenses as a minimum.
attributes.additional_details:
I call on the government and specifically the Department for Work and Pensions to make it compulsory for all organisations that offer volunteer internships to fairly recompense each intern their reasonable travel and subsistence expenses as a minimum.  Please read the following report for further information.

http://www.ippr.org/assets/media/images/media/files/publication/2011/05/Why%20interns%20need%20a%20fair%20wage_1788.pdf
